boardgame.name: Clockwork Wars
boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Clockwork Wars is an epic board game of conquest, discovery, and espionage from Eagle-Gryphon Games. In Clockwork Wars, 2-4 players command a unique race of creatures in a tense war set in an alternate universe where magic and steam-era technology collide. Take control of the human _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Purebreeds_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, or one of three hybrid races (Troglodytes, Rhinochs, and Mongrels). Your goal is to vanquish your foes and accumulate the most victory points through seven turns of play. You earn points by fighting for control of territories that contain valuable natural resources. To win these battles, you need manpower gained by seizing villages and developing them into cities. Invest in research and discover astonishing new technologies, like magical Golems, an Analytical Engine, and the wondrous Spire of the Gods. Position your troops, research powerful discoveries, employ espionage, and conquer your enemies to win the game!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Clockwork Wars features:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A modular map composed of hexagonal tiles and nine territory types (including manufactories, sorcerer's towers, and citadels) that allows for infinite replayability._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Four different races to choose from, each with its own unique units._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Hidden and simultaneous unit deployment that provides constant tension._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Short turns packed with tough decisions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Simple, diceless combat resolution._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A card-based espionage system._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A unique _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;technology tree_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; that is different for every game. Research discoveries in one of three different disciplines: Sorcery, Science, and Religion._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Light civilization-building mechanisms, as players upgrade villages into cities and research discoveries through three successive, historical ages._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Rules for both _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;free-for-all_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; play, as well as an official 2 vs. 2 team variant_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Mint!!! Still in the shrink-wrap. Clockwork Wars base game and Sentience Expansion Origins 2016 Flea Market order for divine_justice! Delivery at Origins 2016

EAGLE-GRYPHON GAMES (EAG101474N) It is a time of civil war and chaos. The hybrid races have cast off their chains of subjugation and are embroiled in a desperate battle for independence and state supremacy. Environmental destruction from years of war has led to a world of limited natural resources, food shortages, and desperation. These are the Clockwork Wars. Clockwork Wars is a game for 2-4 players who each command a unique race of creatures in a tense war game set in a Fantasy-Steam Punk universe. Take control of the calculating Purebreeds, the industrious Troglodytes, the mighty Rhinochs, or the proud Mongrels. Invest in research and discover astonishing new technologies, like Golems, Analytical Engines, and the wondrous Spire of the Gods. Your goal is to vanquish your foes and accumulate the most victory points through seven turns of play. You earn points by fighting for control of territories that contain valuable natural resources and to win these battles, you will need manpower gained by seizing villages and developing them into cities. Position your troops, research powerful discoveries, employ espionage, and conquer your enemies to win the game!
Played a few times, so some scoresheets used. Otherwise, great condition.
